org.hibernate.validator.constraints.time

Annotation Type DurationMax


  • @Documented
 @Constraint(validatedBy={})
 @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE,CONSTRUCTOR,PARAMETER,TYPE_USE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Repeatable(value=DurationMax.List.class)
 @ReportAsSingleViolation
 @Incubating
public @interface DurationMax
    The annotated Duration element must be shorter than or equal to the one constructed as a sum of nanos(), millis(), seconds(), minutes(), hours(), days().
    Author:
    Marko Bekhta

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      long days 
      Class<?>[] groups 
      long hours 
      boolean inclusive
      Specifies whether the specified maximum is inclusive or exclusive.
      String message 
      long millis 
      long minutes 
      long nanos 
      Class<? extends Payload>[] payload 
      long seconds 

    • Element Detail

      • message

        public abstract String message
        Default:
        "{org.hibernate.validator.constraints.time.DurationMax.message}"

      • groups

        public abstract Class<?>[] groups
        Default:
        {}

      • payload

        public abstract Class<? extends Payload>[] payload
        Default:
        {}

      • days

        public abstract long days
        Default:
        0L

      • hours

        public abstract long hours
        Default:
        0L

      • minutes

        public abstract long minutes
        Default:
        0L

      • seconds

        public abstract long seconds
        Default:
        0L

      • millis

        public abstract long millis
        Default:
        0L

      • nanos

        public abstract long nanos
        Default:
        0L

      • inclusive

        public abstract boolean inclusive
        Specifies whether the specified maximum is inclusive or exclusive. By default, it is inclusive.
        Returns:
        true if the value must be smaller or equal to the specified maximum, false if the value must be smaller
        Default:
        true
